title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 13:59  
xwiki-bridge - (14:03): [Vincent Massol] test  
xwiki-bridge - (14:03): [Vincent Massol] cool logging is working: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/IRC/xwikiArchive20091209  
xwiki-bridge - (14:05): [Vincent Massol] ok fyi I've removed the old code on the main wiki  
xwiki-bridge - (14:05): [Vincent Massol] all the code is now on dev.xwiki.org in the IRC space  
xwiki-bridge - (14:05): [Vincent Massol] the IRCCode space on dev.xwiki.org contain old stuff that we need to sort out  
xwiki-bridge - (14:05): [Vincent Massol] (we need to keep old class def to see the old IRC archives though, or we'll need to convert them)  
vmassol left #xwiki at 14:06  
xwiki-bridge - (14:06): jira IRC  
xwiki-bridge - (14:07): help  
xwiki-bridge - (14:07): news  
xwiki-bridge - (14:07): [Vincent Massol] note that for the moment news will only return changes on the dev wiki and not on other wikis  
xwiki-bridge - (14:13): jira IRC  
xwiki-bridge - (14:13): [Vincent Massol] :)  
xwiki-bridge - (14:14): [Vincent Massol] some test with a XWIKI-1000 jira issue.... blah blah  
xwiki-bridge - (14:14): [Vincent Massol] hehe  
xwiki-bridge - (14:14): [Vincent Massol] glerouge: happy?  
xwiki-bridge - (14:14): [glerouge] nice :)  
xwiki-bridge - (14:15): [glerouge] great, thanks  
xwiki-bridge - (14:15): [glerouge] xwikibotspam is back at last :)  
xwiki-bridge - (14:19): [Vincent Massol] ok I'm done, stopping working on IRC Bot for now  
xwiki-bridge - (14:19): [Vincent Massol] have fun  
xwiki-bridge - (14:19): [Vincent Massol] back to wiki macros....  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (14:21): I finished the XSKINX-9 patch changes.  
xwiki-bridge - (14:49): search IRC  
Enygma` left at 15:18 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out)  
xwiki-bridge - (16:20): [Vincent Massol] hmm rollbacks don't seem to generate events  
xwiki-bridge - (16:20): [Vincent Massol] I've just rolled back the page and we didn't get any notification  
xwiki-bridge - (16:29): [Vincent Massol] hmm doc creation also doesn't generate events... hmm maybe it's a bug in the IRC bOt. Checking  
xwiki-bridge - (16:31): [tmortagne] Vincent Massol: what events are you listening to ?  
xwiki-bridge - (16:31): [Vincent Massol] that's what I was cehcking  
xwiki-bridge - (16:31): [Vincent Massol] it's wrong  
xwiki-bridge - (16:31): [Vincent Massol]  List<Event> getEvents()  
xwiki-bridge - (16:31): [Vincent Massol]     {  
xwiki-bridge - (16:31): [Vincent Massol]         return Arrays.asList(new DocumentUpdateEvent())  
xwiki-bridge - (16:31): [Vincent Massol]     }  
xwiki-bridge - (16:31): [Vincent Massol] well  
xwiki-bridge - (16:32): [tmortagne] DocumentUpdateEvent is just about document modification  
xwiki-bridge - (16:32): [Vincent Massol] I thought it would also capture create and delete  
xwiki-bridge - (16:32): [Vincent Massol] fixing  
xwiki-bridge - (16:32): [tmortagne] I get a 403 Forbidden from svn, impossible to commit for the release  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 16:35  
xwiki-bridge - (16:38): [Vincent Massol] tmortagne: so DocumentSaveEvent is only for creation or also all updates?  
xwiki-bridge - (16:38): [tmortagne] there is nothing for all updates  
xwiki-bridge - (16:38): [tmortagne] DocumentSaveEvent just have a bad name  
xwiki-bridge - (16:38): [tmortagne] should be DocumentCreateEvent  
xwiki-bridge - (16:38): [Vincent Massol] so it should be DocumentCreateEvent  
xwiki-bridge - (16:38): [Vincent Massol] ?  
xwiki-bridge - (16:38): [Vincent Massol] ok  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 16:42  
xwiki-bridge - (16:43): [Vincent Massol] ok works now  
xwiki-bridge - (16:46): [tmortagne] looks like svn ssl certificate is expired  
xwiki-bridge - (16:53): [tmortagne] ha non my fault i'm using http instead of https as usual  
xwiki-bridge - (16:54): [Vincent Massol] :)  
xwiki-bridge - (17:25): \* joel has set the subject to: XWiki public chat  
CalebJamesDeLisl left at 18:14 (":]"
